## Popover

浮动菜单

### Usage
<pre><code class="language-javascript">
import Popover from 'nj/popover' //引入组件
</code>
</pre>


<style>
    .pop-menu a{display:block;padding:8px 25px;color:#333;border-bottom:1px solid #ddd;}
</style>
<button id="demo-popover-button">show popover</button>
